server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server()
      Starts a server on the default port.
      Server(int port)
      Starts a server on the given port.
      Server(int port, int maxConnections)
      Starts a server on the given port with the max connections specified.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Start a server on the default port or a port specified on the command line.
      void run()
      Run the server.
      void stop()
      Stop the server.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server()
        Starts a server on the default port.

      • Server

        public Server(int port)
        Starts a server on the given port.
        Parameters:
        port - the port to start the server listening on

      • Server

        public Server(int port,
              int maxConnections)
        Starts a server on the given port with the max connections specified.
        Parameters:
        port - the port to start the server listening on
        maxConnections - the maximum number of connections for the server

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the server. Connect to a port and begin listening for traffic. Create and set up contexts with the handlers for each operation the server needs.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the server. This has a 1000ms timeout set.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Start a server on the default port or a port specified on the command line.
        Parameters:
        args - a port can be specified as the first parameter
